participant_1.background:
I take a walk to clear my head and release endorphins.
i dance ballet.
I love the feeling of the wind in my hair when I'm driving my truck.
I'm passionate about spending time with my family, though it can be difficult at times.
My dogs have been my greatest joy and my biggest challenge.

I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.
i fantasize about living in another country.
i draw comics.
i like to work out at the gym to christian electronic dance music.

content.text: Hi! I'm a dog lover and dancer. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to draw comics, work out, and fantasize about living in another country.
That's cool! I love to draw too. I usually draw my dogs. Do you have any pets?
I have 2 cats. I love them to death but they're so hard to take care of in the summer!
Oh, I can imagine. Cats are so independent but they also need a lot of attention. I have a big family so it's easier for us to take care of them.
Yeah, I wish I had a bigger family to help me take care of my cats. Do you have any other pets?
No, just my two dogs. They're my best friends.
I'm sure they are! I love dogs.
What kind of dogs do you have?
One's a golden retriever and the other is a poodle.
